update tb_reserv set res_state = (case when res_state = 1 and to_char(res_usedate,'yyyymm') >= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') and to_char(res_usedate,'yyyymm') <= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') then 3
when res_state = 3 and to_char(res_usedate,'yyyymm') < to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') then 4
when res_state = 1 and to_char(res_usedate,'yyyymm') > to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') then 1 end)
